Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) gastric or esophageal tissue sections
Purpose: To semi-quantitatively measure HER2 expression in gastric and esophageal cancer tissue to guide clinical decision-making.
Container: Glass microscope slide containing FFPE tissue section
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, slide incubator, automated or manual staining platform, microscope (40x and 100x objectives)
